descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b]UPDATE - 23/02/12
This mod is now included as a download in my new mod Sylgja Upgraded, which gives people a choice of clothes as well as simply removing her pickaxe.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10956]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10956[/url][/b]

=================================
[/size]

Removes the pickaxe from Sylgja, for people who would prefer her without it, like if having her as your spouse.

If you load your save inside your home and she still has it, just exit and re-enter the house and it'll be removed.[/size]

[b][u]=Installation=[/u]

Use Nexus Mod Manager

[u]=Manual Install=[/u]

Extract the .esp file to your SkyrimData folder. Using a mod manager ensure SylgjaNoPickaxe.esp is ticked. Or from the Skyrim Launcher, in Data Files.

[u]=Uninstallation=[/u]

Deactivate using Nexus Mod Manager if you installed it that way.

Or manually delete SylgjaNoPickaxe.esp from your SkyrimData folder.

[u]=Conflicts=[/u]

Probably conflicts with any mods that change Sylgja.[/b]
author: B1gBadDaddy
